basics.description: **Note:** Please refer to the following before installing the solution: • Review the solution [Release Notes](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/tree/master/Solutions/CTM360/ReleaseNotes.md) • There may be [known issues](https://aka.ms/sentinelsolutionsknownissues) pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing. The [HACKERVIEW](https://hackerview.ctm360.com/) and [CBS](https://cbs.ctm360.com/) solutions for Microsoft Sentinel enable you to ingest their respective event data into Microsoft Sentinel using the REST API. This integration streamlines the process of collecting and analyzing security event information. With these solutions, you can enhance your organization's ability to detect and respond to potential security threats effectively. ## HACKERVIEW [HACKERVIEW](https://hackerview.ctm360.com/) is CTM360s External Attack Surface Management platform. It combines automated asset discovery, issue identification/management, remediation guidelines, security ratings, and third-party risk management. This platform maps your organizations digital presence automatically, operating in a passive and non-intrusive manner leveraging data in the public domain. ## CyberBlindspot [CyberBlindspot](https://cbs.ctm360.com/) is CTM360 Digital Risk Protection platform which combines surface, deep, and dark web monitoring, including brand protection, anti-phishing, and takedowns. The platform enables you to take action on incidents derived from threat intelligence that is directly linked to your organization. **Data Connectors:** 2, **Parsers:** 7, **Analytic Rules:** 240 [Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel](https://aka.ms/azuresentinel) | [Learn more about Solutions](https://aka.ms/azuresentinelsolutionsdoc)

metadata.hidden: Hiding location, we get it from the log analytics workspace

basics.name: getLAWorkspace
basics.toolTip: This filters by workspaces that exist in the Resource Group selected

basics.name: workspace
basics.label: Workspace
basics.toolTip: This dropdown will list only workspace that exists in the Resource Group selected

options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for CTM360 CyberBlindSpot (Serverless). You can get CTM360 CyberBlindSpot (Serverless) data in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.

link.label: Learn more about connecting data sources

options.text: This Solution installs the data connector for CTM360 HackerView (Serverless). You can get CTM360 HackerView (Serverless) data in your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. After installing the solution, configure and enable this data connector by following guidance in Manage solution view.

link.label: Learn more about connecting data sources
